title: Runway ML â€” AI Tool Review
description: Runway ML is a creative AI platform offering text-to-video, image-to-video, and AI video editing tools used by Hollywood professionals. Runway is one of the most established AI video creation platforms, offering Gen-3 Alpha for text-to-video generation, image-to-video, video inpainting, background removal, and professional video editing tools. It's widely used in Hollywood productions and by content creators. The Act-One feature allows for face and expression transfer. Runway is the go-to for professional AI video work. Highlights: Professional-grade video generation. Wide range of video tools. Hollywood adoption. Image-to-video conversion. Act-One for expression transfer.
